item.description:
The Fun with Alcohol and Social Fun groups will also be joining us.

The weather forecast is for sun and above normal temperatures on Thursday night.

McCormick and Schmick's in Faneuil Hall is teaming with Harpoon Brewery to celebrate with their "Open The Summer Patio Party" on Thursday, May 6, from 5:00pm to 9:00pm. (Weather Permitting) This is one of Boston's best patios to see and be seen.

Harpoon will be pouring IPAs and UFOs.

There will be a complimentary buffet starting at 6:00 pm, while supplies last.

Live music featuring Endless Summer

A raffle to win a bunch of Harpoon prizes.

Admission is $10.00 at the door (includes a beer token for one IPA or UFO).

Show your Friend of Harpoon card and you get another token. Additional Beer tokens are $5.00.

Game time for the Red Sox game vs the Angels is 7:10pm. Stay and watch for a while.

The weather will be perfect.

This is a 21 plus event.
item.name: McCormick & Schmick's Open The Summer Patio Party & Watch Sox vs Angels Option
